video.title: Bitten
video.synopsis: Elena Michaels tries to stray from the pack of werewolves that turned her into a monster, but her efforts are thwarted by a string of grisly murders.

episodes.synopsis: Elena Michaels, the world's only female werewolf, must choose between her new human existence and her former life with a pack of werewolves.
episodes.title: Summons

episodes.synopsis: At Stonehaven, Elena tracks the killer Mutt (the Pack term for rogue werewolves) while avoiding the advances of Clay Danvers, her former lover.
episodes.title: Prodigal

episodes.synopsis: Old chemistry resurfaces as Elena and Clay work together to track the Mutt to a warehouse rave. But when Elena threatens the Mutt and his fear triggers the Change, they are faced with fighting him in his wolf form, resulting in a deadly blood bath.
episodes.title: Trespass

episodes.synopsis: With a growing sexual tension between them, Elena and Clay pair up to investigate why psychotic killers are suddenly being "bitten" into werewolves.
episodes.title: Grief

episodes.synopsis: Elena's origins as a werewolf and the history of her love affair with Clay are revealed as she struggles to defend Clay against suspicions of murder.
episodes.title: Bitten

episodes.synopsis: Elena's commitment to Philip and her human life are interrupted by Santos. Meanwhile, at Stonehaven, Jeremy must fight to keep his alpha status.
episodes.title: Committed

episodes.synopsis: With Santos revealed as the leader of the Mutt uprising, the Pack accepts his offer to discuss a truce. But when the meeting proves to be a trap, the Pack suffers heavy losses and Elena and Clay are forced to go on the offensive.
episodes.title: Stalking

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy is poisoned and growing weaker by the hour. Elena and Clay rush to discover what toxin is killing their Alpha.
episodes.title: Prisoner

episodes.synopsis: When Santos enlists the notorious killer Jimmy Koenig to wipe out the Pack, everyone must put personal issues aside in order to survive.
episodes.title: Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: Elena's two worlds collide when Elena returns to Toronto for her art show and Clay is ordered to go with her for protection and surf on current lover Philip's couch.
episodes.title: Descent

episodes.synopsis: As Elena attempts damage control with jilted lover Philip, who is now aware of her romantic history with Clay, the Mutts launch a coordinated attack in Toronto.
episodes.title: Settling

episodes.synopsis: Unwilling to lose anymore loved ones, Elena disobeys her Alpha's commands and finally embrace the killer within in order to free a captured Clay.
episodes.title: Caged

episodes.synopsis: Having learned the truth about Clay's role in her werewolf origins, Elena reunites with the Pack at Stonehaven. Together, they prepare for a final stand against a Mutt army led by Santos and the mysterious James Williams, poised to take them down.
episodes.title: Ready

episodes.synopsis: While Elena and the pack hunt for Malcolm, the Council of International Alphas tells Jeremy to kill Malcolm or lose his control over North America.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: While the pack interrogates Malcolm, Clay investigates a mysterious symbol and discovers a coven of witches whose agenda competes with the pack's.
episodes.title: Scare Tactics

episodes.synopsis: After losing Malcolm, the pack and the coven of witches reluctantly join forces against a common threat, which inflicts heavy losses on them both.
episodes.title: Hell's Teeth

episodes.synopsis: A powerful cult abducts Elena and subjects her to painful tests. Meanwhile, the pack and the witches use dark magic to find their missing members.
episodes.title: Dead Meat

episodes.synopsis: Elena fights to stay alive while the pack and the coven try to unravel the mystery of Aleister's identity and the location of his compound.
episodes.title: Rabbit Hole

episodes.synopsis: Aleister uses magic to turn Elena's darkest fears against her. Meanwhile, Clay and Paige fight each other while searching for the cult's compound.
episodes.title: Nine Circles

episodes.synopsis: The pack rallies around Jeremy when the Spanish alpha tries to blackmail him into killing the Russian alpha, but Savannah derails their plans.
episodes.title: Bad Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Trapping Clay's mind in its own subconscious, Aleister possesses his body and infiltrates Stonehaven in a bid to kidnap Savannah.
episodes.title: Dark Arts

episodes.synopsis: Trying to find Aleister, Elena and her cohorts discover his nefarious plans for Savannah. Meanwhile, Ruth has another plan for vanquishing Aleister.
episodes.title: Scavenger's Daugther

episodes.synopsis: Storming the Delphi building to save Savannah, the witches and the werewolves, Elena and the pack provoke a final showdown with Aleister.
episodes.title: Fine Temporum
